name: Invasion
description: In the near future the land invaded by huge colonies of alien creatures . They're going to destroy all of mankind , and to consolidate their race as the inhabitants of the earth. Hurry up , the Earth is in danger!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Worst cringe game that i had to idle for cards.
I wasted 18 minutes trying to get acid, but i saw this game instead

this game is complete ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t. Ugly graphis, repetative gameplay and an old concept. I sencierly hope that the develepors find a new profession and delete this crap form the store. Nothing more to say to this stupid ugly boring repetetive, exhausting, utterly stupid 'game'.

This game is strangely nostalgic and enjoyable, It's definately worth checking out.  Unsure why, but this game gives off a strong vibe of an older game without trying to force the impression like many other games.  To keep my review from being confusing: the graphics aren't great, the enemies are generic and the game itself is as simple as it gets. Still I enjoy playing and trying to beat it.
has cards, pretty good to idle to be honost
Very bland twin stick arena shooter (flash tier). The worst part is that more expensive guns are even worse than cheaper upgraded ones. Got demotivated and bored after 15 minutes.
Invasion is a game that I recommend because: - is a method to banish boredom - is indie - it has trading cards - it has action  Enjoy!
Frustrating, not because it is hard, but because it is wacky
